title: Enhancing Business Competencies: Project-Based Language Instruction Utilizing Online Collaborative Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Project collaboration experience and intermediate or higher language proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute language projects using online collaboration tools.
Learners can enhance language problem-solving skills through learner-learner and learner-instructor interactions.
Learners can demonstrate language application skills through project outcome evaluations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
